thread.title: Manchester United and Chelsea target Antoine Griezmann insists there is "no need to change"
thread.title_full: Manchester United and Chelsea target Antoine Griezmann insists there is "no need to change"

author: Aaron Flanagan
title: Manchester United and Chelsea target Antoine Griezmann insists there is "no need to change"
text:
Sport Manchester United and Chelsea target Antoine Griezmann insists there is "no need to change" Griezmann scored a penalty for France over the weekend and still insists he is not thinking about major changes this summer Share Griezmann has been linked with moves to the Premier League this summer (Photo: AFP) Share Get   
Antoine Griezmann has again poured cold water on his links to Manchester United and Chelsea by insisting that there is "no need to change". 
The Atletico Madrid striker scored a penalty for France as they defeated Luxembourg 3-1 in their World Cup 2018 qualifier on Saturday night. 
Griezmann's domestic future has been up in the air with Premier League clubs among those weighing up a summer move for the 26-year-old. 
Jose Mourinho is reported to be looking at striking options and it is believed that the France forward is one of his major targets if he becomes available. Griezmann scored a penalty in Frances win over Luxembourg on Saturday night (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) He could be on the move in his domestic career in the near future (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
